name: traefik
tagline: A dynamic reverse proxy and load balancer
description: Traefik is a modern reverse proxy and load balancer that dynamically discovers services and routes traffic. It supports Kubernetes, Docker, and more, with a simple configuration, web dashboard, and extensive HTTP API.

features.title: Load Balancing
features.description: Distribute traffic across multiple backend servers with various load balancing algorithms

features.title: Docker Support
features.description: Support Docker, Kubernetes, Consul, and other service discovery mechanisms

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Monitor routes, services, and middleware through a real-time web dashboard

features.title: Data Export
features.description: Export metrics to Prometheus, Datadog, or other monitoring systems for observability
